name: Conversion Support
tag_list: live-chat-software, live-chat, website-chat, proactive-chat, webchat, increase-sales, sales-chat
description: Live Chat Software and Service Provider
overview:
Conversion Support is a provider of Live Chat Software for increasing sales, lowering shopping cart abandonment, and providing excellent customer service on a website. Conversion Support uses leading technologies to build 100% web-based software, which requires no installation and runs completely in the browser.

Conversion Support Live Chat Software increases sales by providing yet another communication channel for customers to contact a sales person to get quick answers to questions. With proactive chat, rules are defined which help detect leads or customers who exhibit signs that they may be in danger of abandoning their purchase. Using this technology, the software notifies a sales or customer service representative that a customer needs help, before the sale is lost.

Conversion Support offers free, no obligation, 30 day software trials to customers who sign up at http://www.conversionsupport.com/sign-up.html.

offices.address2: 4th Floor, Pinnacle Building,  International Tech Park,
